channel.title: Comments on: Family-Integrated Church 14: Why the family-integrated church is not demanded by the regulative principle! (Part 1)

item.title: By: george
item.dc:creator: george
item.description:
Thank you for your post. I have some quesitons i am trying to work thru. Does the regulative principle apply only to worship? Note John Frame has a broader view http://www.frame-poythress.org/frame_articles/RegulativePrinciple.htm
Given it does or doesn't my concern is that most every church has worship and sunday school inseperably linked. THe emphasis seems equal and that the leadership would be overwhelmingly pleased if every worshiper attended the sundsy schol. Application of the regulative principle helps to examine this extra meeting. Other corporate gatherings are not so linked to the corporate worphip.
